channel.title: CVE Feed for hapijs -- formula
channel.description: The latest CVEs for hapijs -- formula

item.title: CVE-2023-25166|2024-08-02T11:18:35.265Z -- hapijs -- formula
item.description: formula is a math and string formula parser. In versions prior to 3.0.1 crafted user-provided strings to formula's parser might lead to polynomial execution time and a denial of service. Users should upgrade to 3.0.1+. There are no known workarounds for this vulnerability.
